body_html:
@abhi18av I suspect that your original problem was due to trying to import tensorflow while running python in a directory with a subdir named tensorflow? Could you please try this in a different directory?

❯ pip3 uninstall tensorflow
Cannot uninstall requirement tensorflow, not installed

This is mentioned in the instructions on https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac:

Optional. If Step 5 failed (typically because you invoked a pip version lower than 8.1), install TensorFlow in the active virtualenv environment by issuing a command of the following format...

❯ pip3 uninstall tensorflow

This is mentioned in the instructions on https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac:

Optional. If Step 5 failed (typically because you invoked a pip version lower than 8.1), install TensorFlow in the active virtualenv environment by issuing a command of the following format...
body:
@abhi18av I suspect that your original problem was due to trying to `import tensorflow` while running python in a directory with a subdir named tensorflow?  Could you please try this in a different directory?

```
❯ pip3 uninstall tensorflow
Cannot uninstall requirement tensorflow, not installed
```
This is mentioned in the instructions on https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac:
> Optional. If Step 5 failed (typically because you invoked a pip version lower than 8.1), install TensorFlow in the active virtualenv environment by issuing a command of the following format...
